description: The manifest of a Tarken Extension. This is the file that is used to define an extension for https://tarken.ag platform.

name.description: The unique name of the extension. This is defined upon creating the extension and must not be changed later.

displayName.description: The human-made name of the extension that will be shown to users. This is defined upon creating the extension and can be changed later.

version.description: The version of the extension following the semantic versioning.

vendorName.description: The name of the vendor of the extension.

private.description: Whether the extension is private or not. Private extensions are only visible to the organization owner of the extension.

apiVersion.description: The version of the Tarken Extension API that the extension manifest is referencing.

baseUrl.description: The base URL of the extension. Must be HTTPS when deployed to production.

description.description: The description of the extension. This is defined upon creating the extension and can be changed later.
